# Title
Old Port of Montreal Revitalization Project (Phase 1)
(Optimization of Public Spaces and Monuments in Canada: Revitalization of the Quebec Port of Montreal)

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015361
**Amendment Number:** 4

**Project Overview:**
This Request for Qualifications (RFQ) constitutes the initial stage of the procurement process for the revitalization of the Old Port of Montreal (OPOP) Phase 1. The scope of the project is to develop a master plan for the revitalization, encompassing architectural and engineering services. The expected duration for the design-build work is 3 years, commencing on July 12, 2023. The project budget is estimated at $40 million, for which the procurement entity has secured sufficient funding.

**Key Dates:**

*   **Publication Date:** November 30, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2023 (11:00 AM MST)
*   **Amendment Date:** February 3, 2023

**Trade Agreements:**

The procurement entity is authorized to engage in competitive bidding under various trade agreements. The relevant trade agreements for this project are listed below:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Regional Opportunities:**
The project location is Quebec (excluding the National Capital Region).

**contracting Information**
*   Contracting Entity: Vieux-Port de Montréal (Deratte, Rodolphe)
*   Entity Address: 333, de la Commune St. W., Montréal, Québec H2Y 2E2
*   Contact Information: Tel: 514-838-4524, Email: rderatte@vieuxportdemontreal.com

Seeking Qualifications
Vieux-Port de Montréal invites competent contractors to participate in the qualification process associated with this procurement.

**Notice:**
This project is collaborative and explores the creation of optimized services provided to building owners along Montreal's port area. If you are interested in participating, submit your qualifications by the closing date listed above (the contact information is included above).
